reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Would be better if it shared info with a calendar up. Not great for a person who uses a calendar on a regular basis.
reviews.author: Renae Knight

reviews.title: Great Potential, but needs more polishing
reviews.comment: This app looks like it will be a great to-do list, but right now it is too buggy and is missing some key features and interface points. Keep up the good work though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good task list
reviews.comment: Easy to use home screen to do list widget.
reviews.author: A Google User
